treatment-md.title: Sphaerobelum Wongthamwanich, Panha, Sierwald, Wesener & Thirakhupt, 2012, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: A new species of the giant pill-millipede genus Sphaerobelum Verhoeff, 1924 from northern Thailand, with an extensive description and molecular characters (Diplopoda: Sphaerotheriida: Zephroniidae)
